service.edmx:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<edmx:Edmx Version="4.0" xmlns:edmx="http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/ns/edmx">
  <edmx:Reference Uri="https://oasis-tcs.github.io/odata-vocabularies/vocabularies/Org.OData.Aggregation.V1.xml">
    <edmx:Include Alias="Aggregation" Namespace="Org.OData.Aggregation.V1"/>
  </edmx:Reference>
  <edmx:Reference Uri="https://sap.github.io/odata-vocabularies/vocabularies/Analytics.xml">
    <edmx:Include Alias="Analytics" Namespace="com.sap.vocabularies.Analytics.v1"/>
  </edmx:Reference>
  <edmx:Reference Uri="https://sap.github.io/odata-vocabularies/vocabularies/Common.xml">
    <edmx:Include Alias="Common" Namespace="com.sap.vocabularies.Common.v1"/>
  </edmx:Reference>
  <edmx:Reference Uri="https://oasis-tcs.github.io/odata-vocabularies/vocabularies/Org.OData.Core.V1.xml">
    <edmx:Include Alias="Core" Namespace="Org.OData.Core.V1"/>
  </edmx:Reference>
  <edmx:Reference Uri="https://sap.github.io/odata-vocabularies/vocabularies/UI.xml">
    <edmx:Include Alias="UI" Namespace="com.sap.vocabularies.UI.v1"/>
  </edmx:Reference>
  <edmx:DataServices>
    <Schema Namespace="AnalyticsService" xmlns="http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/ns/edm">
      <EntityContainer Name="EntityContainer">
        <EntitySet Name="Customers" EntityType="AnalyticsService.Customers">
          <NavigationPropertyBinding Path="projects" Target="Projects"/>
        </EntitySet>
        <EntitySet Name="Projects" EntityType="AnalyticsService.Projects">
          <NavigationPropertyBinding Path="customer" Target="Customers"/>
        </EntitySet>
        <EntitySet Name="Users" EntityType="AnalyticsService.Users"/>
        <EntitySet Name="WorkItems" EntityType="AnalyticsService.WorkItems">
          <NavigationPropertyBinding Path="assignedTo" Target="Users"/>
          <NavigationPropertyBinding Path="customer" Target="Customers"/>
          <NavigationPropertyBinding Path="project" Target="Projects"/>
        </EntitySet>
        <EntitySet Name="WorkItemsAggr" EntityType="AnalyticsService.WorkItemsAggr">
          <NavigationPropertyBinding Path="assignedTo" Target="Users"/>
          <NavigationPropertyBinding Path="customer" Target="Customers"/>
          <NavigationPropertyBinding Path="project" Target="Projects"/>
        </EntitySet>
      </EntityContainer>
      <EntityType Name="Customers">
        <Key>
          <PropertyRef Name="ID"/>
        </Key>
        <Property Name="createdAt" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Precision="7"/>
        <Property Name="createdBy" Type="Edm.String" MaxLength="255"/>
        <Property Name="modifiedAt" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Precision="7"/>
        <Property Name="modifiedBy" Type="Edm.String" MaxLength="255"/>
        <Property Name="ID" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false"/>
        <Property Name="name" Type="Edm.String"/>
        <NavigationProperty Name="projects" Type="Collection(AnalyticsService.Projects)" Partner="customer"/>
      </EntityType>
      <EntityType Name="Projects">
        <Key>
          <PropertyRef Name="ID"/>
        </Key>
        <Property Name="createdAt" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Precision="7"/>
        <Property Name="createdBy" Type="Edm.String" MaxLength="255"/>
        <Property Name="modifiedAt" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Precision="7"/>
        <Property Name="modifiedBy" Type="Edm.String" MaxLength="255"/>
        <Property Name="ID" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false"/>
        <Property Name="title" Type="Edm.String"/>
        <Property Name="description" Type="Edm.String"/>
        <NavigationProperty Name="customer" Type="AnalyticsService.Customers" Partner="projects">
          <ReferentialConstraint Property="customer_ID" ReferencedProperty="ID"/>
        </NavigationProperty>
        <Property Name="customer_ID" Type="Edm.String"/>
        <Property Name="manager_ID" Type="Edm.String"/>
      </EntityType>
      <EntityType Name="Users">
        <Key>
          <PropertyRef Name="userPrincipalName"/>
        </Key>
        <Property Name="userPrincipalName" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false"/>
        <Property Name="displayName" Type="Edm.String"/>
        <Property Name="givenName" Type="Edm.String"/>
        <Property Name="jobTitle" Type="Edm.String"/>
        <Property Name="mail" Type="Edm.String"/>
        <Property Name="mobilePhone" Type="Edm.String"/>
        <Property Name="officeLocation" Type="Edm.String"/>
        <Property Name="preferredLanguage" Type="Edm.String"/>
        <Property Name="surname" Type="Edm.String"/>
      </EntityType>
      <EntityType Name="WorkItems">
        <Key>
          <PropertyRef Name="assignedTo_userPrincipalName"/>
          <PropertyRef Name="customer_ID"/>
          <PropertyRef Name="project_ID"/>
        </Key>
        <NavigationProperty Name="assignedTo" Type="AnalyticsService.Users">
          <ReferentialConstraint Property="assignedTo_userPrincipalName" ReferencedProperty="userPrincipalName"/>
        </NavigationProperty>
        <NavigationProperty Name="customer" Type="AnalyticsService.Customers">
          <ReferentialConstraint Property="customer_ID" ReferencedProperty="ID"/>
        </NavigationProperty>
        <NavigationProperty Name="project" Type="AnalyticsService.Projects">
          <ReferentialConstraint Property="project_ID" ReferencedProperty="ID"/>
        </NavigationProperty>
        <Property Name="duration" Type="Edm.Decimal" Scale="variable"/>
        <Property Name="activatedDate" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset"/>
        <Property Name="completedDate" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset"/>
        <Property Name="assignedTo_userPrincipalName" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false"/>
        <Property Name="customer_ID" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false"/>
        <Property Name="project_ID" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false"/>
      </EntityType>
      <EntityType Name="WorkItemsAggr">
        <NavigationProperty Name="assignedTo" Type="AnalyticsService.Users">
          <ReferentialConstraint Property="assignedTo_userPrincipalName" ReferencedProperty="userPrincipalName"/>
        </NavigationProperty>
        <NavigationProperty Name="customer" Type="AnalyticsService.Customers">
          <ReferentialConstraint Property="customer_ID" ReferencedProperty="ID"/>
        </NavigationProperty>
        <NavigationProperty Name="project" Type="AnalyticsService.Projects">
          <ReferentialConstraint Property="project_ID" ReferencedProperty="ID"/>
        </NavigationProperty>
        <Property Name="duration" Type="Edm.Decimal" Scale="variable"/>
        <Property Name="activatedDate" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset"/>
        <Property Name="completedDate" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset"/>
        <Property Name="assignedTo_userPrincipalName" Type="Edm.String"/>
        <Property Name="customer_ID" Type="Edm.String"/>
        <Property Name="project_ID" Type="Edm.String"/>
      </EntityType>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.Customers/createdAt">
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>CreatedAt}"/>
        <Annotation Term="Core.Computed" Bool="true"/>
        <Annotation Term="Core.Immutable" Bool="true"/>
        <Annotation Term="UI.HiddenFilter" Bool="true"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.Customers/createdBy">
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>CreatedBy}"/>
        <Annotation Term="Core.Computed" Bool="true"/>
        <Annotation Term="Core.Description" String="{i18n>UserID.Description}"/>
        <Annotation Term="Core.Immutable" Bool="true"/>
        <Annotation Term="UI.HiddenFilter" Bool="true"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.Customers/modifiedAt">
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>ChangedAt}"/>
        <Annotation Term="Core.Computed" Bool="true"/>
        <Annotation Term="UI.HiddenFilter" Bool="true"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.Customers/modifiedBy">
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>ChangedBy}"/>
        <Annotation Term="Core.Computed" Bool="true"/>
        <Annotation Term="Core.Description" String="{i18n>UserID.Description}"/>
        <Annotation Term="UI.HiddenFilter" Bool="true"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.Customers/name">
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>Customers.name}"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.Projects/createdAt">
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>CreatedAt}"/>
        <Annotation Term="Core.Computed" Bool="true"/>
        <Annotation Term="Core.Immutable" Bool="true"/>
        <Annotation Term="UI.HiddenFilter" Bool="true"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.Projects/createdBy">
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>CreatedBy}"/>
        <Annotation Term="Core.Computed" Bool="true"/>
        <Annotation Term="Core.Description" String="{i18n>UserID.Description}"/>
        <Annotation Term="Core.Immutable" Bool="true"/>
        <Annotation Term="UI.HiddenFilter" Bool="true"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.Projects/modifiedAt">
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>ChangedAt}"/>
        <Annotation Term="Core.Computed" Bool="true"/>
        <Annotation Term="UI.HiddenFilter" Bool="true"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.Projects/modifiedBy">
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>ChangedBy}"/>
        <Annotation Term="Core.Computed" Bool="true"/>
        <Annotation Term="Core.Description" String="{i18n>UserID.Description}"/>
        <Annotation Term="UI.HiddenFilter" Bool="true"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.Projects/title">
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>Projects.title}"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.Projects/description">
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>Projects.description}"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.EntityContainer/WorkItems">
        <Annotation Term="Aggregation.ApplySupported">
          <Record Type="Aggregation.ApplySupportedType">
            <PropertyValue Property="PropertyRestrictions" Bool="false"/>
          </Record>
        </Annotation>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.WorkItems/assignedTo">
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>WorkItems.assignedTo}"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.WorkItems/customer">
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>WorkItems.customer}"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.WorkItems/project">
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>WorkItems.project}"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.WorkItems/duration">
        <Annotation Term="Aggregation.default" EnumMember="Aggregation.defaultType/SUM"/>
        <Annotation Term="Analytics.AccumulativeMeasure" Bool="true"/>
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>WorkItems.duration}"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.WorkItems/activatedDate">
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>WorkItems.activatedDate}"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.WorkItems/completedDate">
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>WorkItems.completedDate}"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.WorkItems/assignedTo_userPrincipalName">
        <Annotation Term="Analytics.Dimension" Bool="true"/>
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>WorkItems.assignedTo}"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.WorkItems/customer_ID">
        <Annotation Term="Analytics.Dimension" Bool="true"/>
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>WorkItems.customer}"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.WorkItems/project_ID">
        <Annotation Term="Analytics.Dimension" Bool="true"/>
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>WorkItems.project}"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.WorkItemsAggr">
        <Annotation Term="UI.Chart">
          <Record Type="UI.ChartDefinitionType">
            <PropertyValue Property="ChartType" EnumMember="UI.ChartType/Donut"/>
            <PropertyValue Property="DimensionAttributes">
              <Collection>
                <Record Type="UI.ChartDimensionAttributeType">
                  <PropertyValue Property="Dimension" PropertyPath="customer_ID"/>
                  <PropertyValue Property="Role" EnumMember="UI.ChartDimensionRoleType/Category"/>
                </Record>
              </Collection>
            </PropertyValue>
            <PropertyValue Property="Dimensions">
              <Collection>
                <PropertyPath>customer_ID</PropertyPath>
              </Collection>
            </PropertyValue>
            <PropertyValue Property="MeasureAttributes">
              <Collection>
                <Record Type="UI.ChartMeasureAttributeType">
                  <PropertyValue Property="Measure" PropertyPath="duration"/>
                  <PropertyValue Property="Role" EnumMember="UI.ChartMeasureRoleType/Axis1"/>
                </Record>
              </Collection>
            </PropertyValue>
            <PropertyValue Property="Measures">
              <Collection>
                <PropertyPath>duration</PropertyPath>
              </Collection>
            </PropertyValue>
          </Record>
        </Annotation>
        <Annotation Term="UI.LineItem">
          <Collection>
            <Record Type="UI.DataField">
              <PropertyValue Property="Value" Path="assignedTo_userPrincipalName"/>
            </Record>
            <Record Type="UI.DataField">
              <PropertyValue Property="Value" Path="customer_ID"/>
            </Record>
            <Record Type="UI.DataField">
              <PropertyValue Property="Value" Path="project_ID"/>
            </Record>
            <Record Type="UI.DataField">
              <PropertyValue Property="Value" Path="duration"/>
            </Record>
          </Collection>
        </Annotation>
        <Annotation Term="UI.SelectionFields">
          <Collection>
            <PropertyPath>activatedDate</PropertyPath>
            <PropertyPath>completedDate</PropertyPath>
            <PropertyPath>assignedTo_userPrincipalName</PropertyPath>
            <PropertyPath>customer_ID</PropertyPath>
            <PropertyPath>project_ID</PropertyPath>
          </Collection>
        </Annotation>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.EntityContainer/WorkItemsAggr">
        <Annotation Term="Aggregation.ApplySupported">
          <Record Type="Aggregation.ApplySupportedType">
            <PropertyValue Property="PropertyRestrictions" Bool="true"/>
          </Record>
        </Annotation>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.WorkItemsAggr/assignedTo">
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>WorkItems.assignedTo}"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.WorkItemsAggr/customer">
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>WorkItems.customer}"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.WorkItemsAggr/project">
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>WorkItems.project}"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.WorkItemsAggr/duration">
        <Annotation Term="Aggregation.default" EnumMember="Aggregation.defaultType/SUM"/>
        <Annotation Term="Analytics.Measure" Bool="true"/>
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>WorkItems.duration}"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.WorkItemsAggr/activatedDate">
        <Annotation Term="Analytics.Dimension" Bool="true"/>
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>WorkItems.activatedDate}"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.WorkItemsAggr/completedDate">
        <Annotation Term="Analytics.Dimension" Bool="true"/>
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>WorkItems.completedDate}"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.WorkItemsAggr/assignedTo_userPrincipalName">
        <Annotation Term="Analytics.Dimension" Bool="true"/>
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>WorkItems.assignedTo}"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.WorkItemsAggr/customer_ID">
        <Annotation Term="Analytics.Dimension" Bool="true"/>
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>WorkItems.customer}"/>
      </Annotations>
      <Annotations Target="AnalyticsService.WorkItemsAggr/project_ID">
        <Annotation Term="Analytics.Dimension" Bool="true"/>
        <Annotation Term="Common.Label" String="{i18n>WorkItems.project}"/>
      </Annotations>
    </Schema>
  </edmx:DataServices>
</edmx:Edmx>
